snippet: Conservative Catholics say Pope Francis’ recent comments about abortion and gay marriage are muddying doctrine to appeal to the broadest possible audience.
abstract: Some conservative American Catholics say Pope Francis has left them feeling abandoned and deeply unsettled with his comments about abortion and gay marriage; feel he is muddying doctrine to appeal to the broadest possible audience; Francis has won affection worldwide in the eight months since becoming pope, and even some atheists are applauding him.
lead_paragraph: Conservative Catholics say Pope Francis’ recent comments about abortion and gay marriage are muddying doctrine to appeal to the broadest possible audience.
